post.body: Right, Sarah. Associate is used a lot by me but if I can see myself hanging out with you - IRL - friend it is.
They sing a song only you can hear. I like this!
LOL! I know that's right! We walked uphill both ways. It was up to my waist! Wait. I was shorter then, wasn't I? :-)
Thanks for the musical interlude, Bruce. :-)
re: http://tinyurl.com/4t4fdu - In short, be a giver! I concur. Thanks for the link!
LOL! We'll let it slide. Happy Birthday to your V. :-)
Happily rockin' Mariah repeatedly. What is better than that? :-) What YOU doing?
LOL! Yeah, yeah. My youngest hit the hay all by herself. She can watch the ball drop in her dreams! :-)
Nano writer, late love of kids, hmmm. You sound a lot like me! Had to follow! :-)
You too! May it be a dynamic year!
Amen! Nothing selfish about taking care of YOU! :-)
No school. I wonder how debilitating the snow will be today.
Back from latest event and chillin' with my babies for the rest of my birthday night.
What a birthday. Secret notes on my laptop. Lunch. Cake. A purple lapdesk. Christmas gifts. I feel loved.
Daughter: Is it your birthday? Me: Yes. D: How old are you? Me: 38. D: You're going to be old soon. Me: 90 y.o.s are old, whippersnapper!
It's @renesa! An IRL friend who is getting the hang of Twitter. Give her some time to get her profile up. She's creative and amazing ya'll!
Hey fellow editors: Would you say "judged on," "judged by" or does it depend?
Now, quick email to the world that we are vending 3x more this month. Are you local? We're doing this next year: http://tinyurl.com/4j36jc
Stupid gaff with one of the proofing jobs - didn't note the immediate time due - but he liked the edits so whew! 2nd job was insane.
And I still need to send out an email tonight. Another long night ahead and I know hubs is missing me. Anybody got the power to slow time?
It's official. I really need to clean my fridge. I HATE cleaning the fridge. But at least I've finally got 2 proofing jobs to do. Yes!
All I want for Christmas is to go home and fall asleep in my hubby's arms. (Mariah has this effect on me. That's why she sings "our song.")
Last day Congresswoman is taking online apps for Inauguration tickets. Girlfriend says she's lucky and I am too. Hope she's right.
Love Actually has arrived - yay! - along with odd gift for Son. Loaned the movie already but I'm just glad it's finally here to stay. :-)
HAPPY NEW YEAR, TWITTERVILLE! ::kiss kiss:: Goodnight!
Seen it a million times. "Mr. Chambers! Don't get on that ship! To Serve Man..It's...it's a cookbook!" Never gets old.
Think I'll catch up on some favorited tweets I couldn't read earlier.
Just found out my newborn, never-before-met nephew is in NY with his mom! I'd smack my bro if he lived here. Will there be a chance to meet?
Bump the lasagna. Stuffed shrimp were waiting for me in the microwave! Yum!
Lasagna calling my name.
Hmm. A little Twilight Zone for awhile? If only I could ferret out the episodes I've somehow missed over the years.
Why. must my offspring. yell-speak to each other. when they are NEXT to each other?
My hubby just crawled beside me and I think he's going...to sleep? He's 40 on Sunday. Maybe we both need our rest. :-)
browsing around http://www.twittermoms.com -- swing by!
Dazzled by "Designer Inspired Handbags - Closeout Specials up to 50% Off | Handbag Planet" ( http://tinyurl.com/4kfbwv )
I see @GeekMommy, @QueenofSpain, @JackieMacD, and @audreychernoff, Welcome all! Pleasure to meet you!
Welcome @ jyl_MomIF, @Dasit, @styleforgrace, @TheNOssip, @twittermoms, @WalkingHorse, and @musingsfromme who hails from my ex-state of MD.
Wow. My jaunt across Twitterville has netted me some new followers! a la Romper Room, I see @janverhoeff, @tabpierce and @markdavidson.
So happy new year most of the world!
What I did not know: East Coast is 31st out of 38 time zones to see 2009. http://www.worldtimezone.com/newyear.html
